summary.para: Enables effects that were implemented with .

param.name: fEnabled
param.para: Specifies whether effects are to be enabled. TRUE specifies to enable effects. FALSE specifies to disable effects.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Returns the list of supported effects in the currently configured video processor.

param.name: puiSupport
param.para: A combination of -typed values that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value specifies the list of supported effect capabilities.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Overrides the rotation operation that is performed in the video processor.

param.name: uiRotation
param.para: Rotation value in degrees. Typically, you can only use values from the enumeration.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: This interface controls how the Video Processor MFT generates output frames.
